quote_payment.description: This table stores information about payments made for quotes.

data.description: The primary key of the table, unique identifier for each payment.
The foreign key referencing the quote this payment is associated with.
The timestamp of when the payment record was created.
The timestamp of when the payment record was last updated.
The payment method used (e.g., credit card, paypal, etc.).
The type of credit card used (e.g., Visa, Mastercard, etc.).
The encrypted credit card number.
The last four digits of the credit card number.
The encrypted credit card security code.
The name of the credit card owner.
The expiration month of the credit card.
The expiration year of the credit card.
The owner of the social security number used for the payment (potentially masked for security).
The start month of the social security number used for the payment.
The start year of the social security number used for the payment.
The purchase order number associated with the payment (if applicable).
Any additional data related to the payment in text format.
The issuing institution for the social security number (potentially masked for security).
Any additional information about the payment in text format.
The ParadoxLabs_TokenBase Card ID (if applicable).
The Paypal Payer ID (if the payment was made through Paypal).
The Paypal Payer Status (if the payment was made through Paypal).
The Paypal Correlation ID (if the payment was made through Paypal).
